title: Christian Slater on ‘If I Had Legs I’d Kick You,’ Child Stardom and Career Longevity: ‘Always Show Up, No Matter What’
summary: In writer-director Mary Bronstein’s “If I Had Legs I’d Kick You,” out Oct. 10 from A24, Christian Slater is more heard than seen. His raspy voice — familiar from a host of memorable movies, from “Heathers” to “Blink Twice,” and a Golden Globe-winning role on “Mr. Robot” — is on the other end of the…
